content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, you look great in your new clothes~
I once saw this gorgeous starry-themed outfit...
But unfortunately, they didn't have it in my size.

content: <size=30>Having three fluffy tails can be annoying, *yeep*...</size>
